meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7468.

td.p: Clarissa Santori, a senior at Northeastern University from Ellicott City, Maryland
Mari Hanley, a junior at Stetson University from Lighthouse Point, Florida
Alex Bourzutschky, a junior at Caltech from Potomac, Maryland

tr.td: SHAKESPEAREAN YARD SALE
AMERICAN HISTORY
POLICE GLOSSARY
SINGLE-NAMED SINGERS
WHAT ARE YOU AFRAID OF?
"EV"ERYTHING

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_DJ_5_2', 'clue_DJ_5_2_stuck', '(Sarah presents three isotopes of hydrogen on the monitor.) Hydrogen has three isotopes: protium with its nucleus made up of one proton, deuterium with one proton and one neutron, and a third radioactive isotope with an additional neutron giving it a mass number of 3; hence, this name')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: (Sarah presents three isotopes of hydrogen on the monitor.) Hydrogen has three isotopes: protium with its nucleus made up of one proton, deuterium with one proton and one neutron, and a third radioactive isotope with an additional neutron giving it a mass number of 3; hence, this name
